directions: Pulse together figs, apricots, and dates in a food processor until finely chopped, then transfer to a bowl and stir in walnuts and wine. Sprinkle spices evenly over mixture and stir until combined well.
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups walnuts (4 oz), finely chopped, toasted , and cooled
1/4 cup sweet red wine such as Manischewitz Extra Heavy Malaga
title: Haroseth
